modName: The Grace of Divine -True 9 Divines Blessings-
summary:
9 divines blessings are poor in vanilla skyrim.
This mod improves them and their amulets all over!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36832-1-1370243604.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Aqua]-Description-[/color][/size][/font]
[size=5][FONT=Arial Black] This mod improves 9 divines blessings and their amulets.
They are not attractive in vanilla,so I made this mod.[/font][/size]

[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Mediumspringgreen]-Effects List-[/color][/size][/font]
[FONT=Arial Black]
[size=5]All effects last [color=Turquoise]10 days[/color].[/size]

[size=6][color=Red]-Akatosh-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Destruction spells are 15% stronger.Magicka regenerates 20% faster.
Amulet:Magicka regenerates 25% faster.Increases Magic Resistance by 15%.[/size]

[size=6][color=salmon]-Arkay-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Damage from undeads decreases by 30%.Increases your health by 25 points.
Amulet:Health regenerates 20% faster.Increases your health by 15 points.[/size]

[size=6][color=gold]-Dibella-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Damage from the opposite sex decreases by 20%.+15 Speechcraft.
Amulet:+10 Speechcraft.Increases Poison Resistance by 30%.[/size]

[size=6][color=Lightskyblue]-Julianos-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Magic skills improve 10% faster.Increases your Magicka by 25 points.
Amulet:Increases your Magicka by 15 points.Destruction and Alteration spells cost 10% less to cast.[/size]

[size=6][color=Greenyellow]-Kynareth-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Stamina regenerates 30% faster.Damage from animals decreases by 30%.50% resistant to disease.
Amulet:Increases your stamina by 20 points.Increases your carry weight by 20 points.[/size]

[size=6][color=Magenta]-Mara-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Restoration spells cost 20% less to cast.Restoration skill improves 30% faster.
Amulet:Restoration spells cost 15% less to cast.Calm spells work on higher level opponents by 5 levels.[/size]

[size=6][color=Steelblue]-Stendarr-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Block 15% more damage with your shield.Increase Heavy and Light Armor skill by 15 points.
Amulet:Block 10% more damage with your shield.Shield Bashing causes shock damage to your enemy.[/size]

[size=6][color=Navajowhite]-Talos-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Time between shouts is reduced 30%.Weapon damage to Elves increases by 30%.
Amulet:Time between shouts is reduced 20%.Increases Frost Resistance by 20%.[/size]

[size=6][color=Goldenrod]-Zenithar-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Prices are 20% better.Carrying capacity increases by 50.Speechcraft skill improves 20% faster.
Amulet:Prices are 20% better.Weapons and armor can be improved 10% better.[/size][/font]


[font=Georgia][size=6][color=Moccasin]-Dawnguard-[/color][/size]
[size=6][color=Moccasin]-Auriel-[/color][/size]
[size=4]Blessing:Allows you to zoom bows and crossbows.You are 15% more effective with missile weapons.[/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=4]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37311/?]Spanish Translation here![/url][/size][/font]
author: metametroid
